abstract: Senate blocks effort by Obama administration to limit amount of potatoes and other starchy vegetables that can be served in school lunches to one cup per student per week, calling measure well-intended but overly prescriptive.
snippet: The Senate moved to block an Obama administration proposal to limit the amount of potatoes and other starchy vegetables that can be served in school lunches.
lead_paragraph: The Senate moved to block an Obama administration proposal to limit the amount of potatoes and other starchy vegetables that can be served in school lunches.

headline.main: Senate Saves the Potato on School Lunch Menus
headline.print_headline: Senate Saves the Potato On School Lunch Menus
headline.seo: Potatoes Get Senate Protection on School Lunch Menus
